Package shared.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection
    This interface can be used to abstract the NetworkRmi and NetworkSocket classes, and use them in a transparent way; they both implement the following methods, however you should look at the class' specific documentation to learn the differences on how to call these methods
    Router
    This interface will route method calls performed on some object, based on the method name as string and on parameters as an array.
    SharedProxyClient
    This interface will be the client-side relay for receiving and making method calls from and to the server.
    SharedProxyServer
    This interface will be the server-side relay for receiving and making method calls from and to the client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MethodRouter
    This class will route the method calls, using the provided method name
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MethodConnectionException
    This exception is thrown whenever a connection problem occurs during a network method call through the method Connection.invokeMethod(String, String, Object[]); it is caught into the classes ProxyClient and ProxyServer
